akas: De Férias com o Ex Brazil
akas from release info: De Férias com o Ex Brazil

1.title: Episode #9.1
1.plot: Ex on the Beach is a UK reality series that features eight single men and women enjoying a summer holiday in paradise while looking for love. However, they are joined by their exes to shake things up. Each ex is there either for revenge or to rekindle their love. The show is narrated by Irish comedian Andrew Maxwell.

12.title: Episode #9.12

However, they are joined by their exes to shake things up. Each ex is there either for revenge or to rekindle their love. The show is narrated by Irish comedian Andrew Maxwell.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Chloe Goodman's Ex Ross Worswick was introduced, and Marco Alexxandre's ex-girlfriend Frankie Thorpe arrived looking for revenge following their sour relationship.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Ashley Cain's ex-girlfriend Talitha Minnis arrives, whilst the housemates continue to get to know each other.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Despite arriving as an ex, Ross receives a shock when his ex-girlfriend Emma Jane Lang arrives on the island. After getting together in the house, Vicky and Ross' brief fling ends.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Dann Conn, former love interest of Vicky Pattinson, arrived during the fourth episode of the series. Meanwhile, Frankie was removed from the house after taking ill. It was announced she would not be returning.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Joss Mooney arrives and despite being an ex-boyfriend of Talitha, he's also had a previous fling with Emma Jane and once shared a kiss with Chloe.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Shelby Billingham made her first appearance. She is the ex-girlfriend of both Joss and Ross.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: After a lot of anticipation, Ricci Guarnaccio arrived on the beach and immediately caused trouble for his ex-fiancée Vicky.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Due to Ashley's aggressive behaviour, he was removed from the house.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: Kayleigh's ex-boyfriend Adam Gabriel arrived to stir things up, and Connor's ex-girlfriend Megan Clark was also introduced wanting to rekindle their romance.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Rogan's ex-girlfriend Jess Impiazzi arrives. After getting together in the house, Anita and Rogan's brief fling ended and they were officially added to each other's ex-list.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Gary Beadle arrives on the beach as Melissa's ex-fling. The group received another instant shock when the fifth ex, Emily Colley arrived and introduced herself as an ex-girlfriend of both Morgan and Rogan, and a one night stand of Gary.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: During the fourth episode, Anita's ex-boyfriend (Joe Chandler) turns up on the beach, in an attempt to win her back.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: In this segment, Charlotte Crosby's eagerly anticipated arrival is witnessed. It is the first time she comes face-to-face with her ex Gary (Gaz) Beadle for a long time.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Danielle Abbott receives a warm welcome from ex-boyfriend Luke Goodfellow, when she made her first appearance in the show.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Ashley Cain, from Season 1, returns to the beach during the penultimate airing, as the ex of Emily Colley.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: "It's the last day and despite all the drama and anxiety some people have made it through. One of the biggest romances of the house is sent on a date- Rogan and Morgan quad biking. The boys realise how much their friendship has kept them going with all the ups and downs of the house. They are best mates for life..."

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Laura Summer's ex-fling Jemma Lucy arrives at the villa. This is the first time a same-sex ex has featured in the show. Also arriving in the was Jordan Davies, an ex-boyfriend of Amy Cooke wanting to cause some trouble.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: Marty Mack arrives as the ex-romance of Jemma Lucy, hoping to win her back.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: Marty Mack's ex-girlfriend Sarah Goodhart showed up, eagerly awaiting a chance to win back his affection.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: After much anticipation Cami-Li arrived at the beach and instantly erupted at ex-fiance Kirk Norcross. Soon after this, Kirk and Jemma's brief romance in the villa came to an end and they were added to each other's ex-list.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: As a new ex arrives, the Tablet of Terror announces a shocking new twist to the proceedings, which also means that instead of two days later, the following ex arrives only one day later.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: A new day, a new ex on the beach. But this one is also an ex-"Ex on the Beach", back for more. On the following day, the House mentally breaks one of the residents.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot: Megan Rees' ex-boyfriend Stephen Cochrane made his debut, unsure of his intentions, and Marty Mack was forced to leave the villa due to illness.

8.title: Episode #3.8
8.plot: The game keeps changing: first, one of the exes announces they are leaving of their own choice. Another shock follows when the Tablet of Terror gives one resident to power to remove one ex from the house. And yet another ex arrives.

9.title: Episode #3.9
9.plot: The arrival of Stephen Bear's ex-girlfriend and Megan McKenna's ex-best friend Connie Wiltshire. Connie intends to stir things up in the villa.

10.title: Episode #3.10
10.plot: After Jordan kissed new arrival Connie the previous night, the future of Jordan and Megan is in doubt. The Tablet of Terror sounds to send the entire villa to the beach.

1.title: Episode #4.1
1.plot: Eight singles, new twists. Now they've been told what show they are going to be in - except for one guy with anger management issues. A new ex arrives on the beach every odd day - but extra exes may arrive at any time. Let the mayhem begin.

2.title: Episode #4.2
2.plot: Day 3 is Ex #2 on the beach. But there is a surprise waiting for everyone in the evening. Day 4 is date time for the lucky ones, but Scotty T, Lewis and Olivia's ex James have to go to the beach. And then a new date twist is introduced.

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: Day 5, a date for Nancy and Scotty. Youssef, Joe and Olivia go welcome Ex #5. Lacey gets to choose 4 people to party with. Ashley gets a penthouse date. Day 6, a boat party for all. But then Tablet of Terror gives Nancy an unpleasant task.

4.title: Episode #4.4
4.plot: Day 7, a date for Olivia and James. Scotty, Lacey and Nancy welcome Ex #6. With a twist or two that change the balance of power in the house. Day 8, water park for all. A date for Lewis and Megan. But in the evening, hell breaks loose.

5.title: Episode #4.5
5.plot: Helen Brigg's second ex Chet Johnson arrived on the beach, and they both instantly rekindled their relationship.

6.title: Episode #4.6
6.plot: James Moore's ex, Kristina Metcalf debuted on the series by arriving during his date with Ashleigh Defty looking to stir things up.

7.title: Episode #4.7
7.plot: The Tablet of Terror forces Gina into an uncomfortable decision. Olivia needs fresh meat and Scotty finally realises that Nancy is the girl for him but will Nancy feel the same way?

8.title: Episode #4.8
8.plot: With the arrival of Vicky's second Ex, Ricci still causing shockwaves, a massive divide forms in the group. And with time on the beach running out the group fears another explosive arrival. Two relationships show promise, Ash loses it with Liam with dire consequences, Dan threatens to lose it with Ricci, and Ricci and Vicky attempt some form of closure with little success.

1.title: Episode #5.1
1.plot: Bear (S3), Jess (S2), Liam (S1), Olivia (S4), Gaz (S2), Jemma (S3), Jordan (S3&4) and Chloe (S1) are back. Gaz is sent on a date with Jess. Jemma gets to choose a date to the penthouse. Chloe, Bear and Jess get to welcome the first Ex.

2.title: Episode #5.2
2.plot: It all ends in tears for Jemma when the next ex arrives and Jemma isn't the only one dreading their arrival back at the villa. Bear gets nowhere with Chloe but when tensions boil over during a dramatic evening. Bear gets the last laugh.

3.title: Episode #5.3
3.plot: The fifth arrival causes chaos for Jemma when she hits it off with her ex Hawley, and Kayleigh gets a surprise when one of her old flames arrives.

4.title: Episode #5.4
4.plot: Charlotte causes a scene with Bear and Olivia is forced to tell the truth to Lillie. When the next Ex washes up on the beach, the claws come out between Jemma and Holly.

5.title: Episode #5.5
5.plot: Things hot up between Holly and Hawley but its the sixth Ex that really turns things upside down as flirtation and unfinished business causes upheaval for the whole villa.

6.title: Episode #5.6
6.plot: Bear and Hawley fight for Lillie, but there's some unfinished business with her Ex that throws everything into disarray. Charlotte's date is disrupted by a new arrival.

7.title: Episode #5.7
7.plot: Everyone is trying to put the drama aside but there's little chance of a quiet night. Lillie gets closer to Bear but nothing is quite as it seems, while Jemma reaches boiling point.

8.title: Episode #5.8
8.plot: The arrival of the next Ex turns a knife in a sore wound for one villa inhabitant, but while another new arrival brings new intrigue, the others need to remember to expect the unexpected.

9.title: Episode #5.9
9.plot: Bear is still on the loose and looking for love, while it's chaos and confusion as the next Ex rocks up on the beach. The fires may be reignited for some but old flames can still burn.

10.title: Episode #5.10
10.plot: It's the last day and with the end near there's unfinished business to attend to. But not before a final Ex arrives to join the party. Will anyone find love and leave the villa happy?

1.title: Episode #6.1
1.plot: Hold onto your bikinis, Ex On The Beach is back, and with more exes than ever! Zahida and Maisie clash over Sean, but when the first Ex blasts onto the beach the fighting really kicks in.

2.title: Episode #6.2
2.plot: The villa reaches breaking point when the arrival of not one but three Exes, causing chaos for lovebirds Ross and Harriette. Meanwhile Zahida's Ex, Joe, spirals out of control.

3.title: Episode #6.3
3.plot: The misery continues for the singles as Sean moves from Zahida to Zaralena, and Harriette's love triangle deepens. Maisie's desperate for action and a Geordie makes a spectacular entrance.

4.title: Episode #6.4
4.plot: The tension in the villa reaches boiling point as Zaralena feels the force of Zahida's rage. Josh has his eye on Nicole, but will it be game over when she discovers a devastating secret?

5.title: Episode #6.5
5.plot: Adam reveals his feelings for Nicole, while Jack and Josh hope for fresh blood in the villa. Zaralena grows closer to Aaron, and Ross and Harriette finally spend a night in the penthouse.

6.title: Episode #6.6
6.plot: The tablet of terror tops up the torment for Becca, and there's even more heartache for Harriette. Zarlena's misery continues but it's the latest ex who threatens to unleash havoc.

7.title: Episode #6.7
7.plot: The arrival of yet another ex bring total carnage to the villa. Nicole faces the truth about Jacques Fraser whil Ross and Hariette are on the rocks once again.

8.title: Episode #6.8
8.plot: Jacques Fraser gets his comeuppance whilst the newest ex blasts on to the beach and into the villa, driving a wedge between Sean and Zahida and causing mayhem for everyone.

9.title: Episode #6.9
9.plot: A new ex arrives with a secret that scandalizes the whole house. One of the exes is voted off the beach. Couples (and former couples) face their worst nightmares when they are introduced to the Shack of Secrets.

10.title: Episode #6.10
10.plot: Hold onto your bikinis, Ex On The Beach is back, and with more exes than ever this season is bound to be filled with drama! (S6, ep10)

imdb.title: Ex on the Beach
plot: Eight single guys and girls head to the beach looking for love. However one by one, their idea of a holiday romance will be ruined as their ex's turn up.::Jiilo_Kim
